name: Hide in the Void
description:
Hide in the Void

In an abstract post-apocalyptic world, Klu is surrounded by a sheer endless amount of enemies. Nowhere is safe – except for the Void, which the attackers mysteriously ignore.

Though he has no Klu where to go, the young boy is determined to save the world. Legends speak of a long lost safe place outside of the Void. On a
 pacifistic quest to find it, Klu will have to prove all his strength and dexterity.

Controls

Move using WASD

Back to Menu with Esc
